A screwdriver is a popular alcoholic highball drink made with orange juice and vodka.
Mix equal parts Vodka, orange soda, and orange juice. Can also be made with other fruit juices.
The Jägerbomb is a bomb shot mixed drink that involves a shot of Jägermeister and a glass of beer.
Fill a standard bar glass about one-third to one-half with beer or Red Bull and then drop a shot of Jager in.
A gin and tonic is a highball cocktail made with gin and tonic water poured over ice.
Mix two parts Gin and three parts tonic water. Garnish with lime and/or lemon to taste.
A fuzzy navel is a mixed drink made from peach schnapps and orange juice.
Mix equal parts peach schnapps and orange juice. Garnish with slice of orange
Cactus Cooler is an orange-pineapple soft drink
Fill a shot glass half with triple sec, half mandarin vodka, then drop into a pint glass half-filled with Rockstar energy drink, and serve.
An Irish Car Bomb is an American beer cocktail that is drunk as a bomb shot.
Fill a standard bar glass about one-third to one-half with Guinness and then mix equal parts Baileys and Jameson in a shot glass. Drop the shot in and drink while fizzing.
A highball made of cola, lime, and dark or light rum.
Mix 1 part rum and 4 parts Coke. Mix and garnish with a slice of lime.
Do you like Pina Coladas? And getting caught in the rain?
Blend together 1.5 ounces coconut cream, 1.5 ounces pineapple juice, 1 ounce rum, 1 ounce coconut rum and garnish with pineapple wedge.
Named after a Cuban iron mine, this drink is an old favorite.
Shake 1.5 ounces of light rum, .75 ounce of lime juice, and .25 ounce simple syrup together, then pour and enjoy
The name\'s Bond, James Bond.
Shake or stir 2.5 ounces Gin and .5 ounce dry vermouth then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist or olive.
The Tom Collins is a Collins cocktail made from gin, lemon juice, sugar and carbonated water
In a cocktail shaker mix 2 ounces gin, 1 ounce lemon juice and 1 tsp sugar. Shake and pour into cocktail glass, add 3 ounces club soda and garnish with lemon.
The margarita is a cocktail consisting of tequila, triple sec and lime or lemon juice, often served with salt on the rim of the glass.
Mix 7 parts Tequila, 4 parts Triple Sec (orange Liquer), and 3 parts Lime juice.
The whiskey sour is a mixed drink containing whiskey, lemon juice, sugar, and optionally, a dash of egg white.
Mix two parts fresh lemon juice and 3 parts Whiskey, pour over ice and serve chilled.
A Manhattan is a cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters.
Pour 9 parts Bourbon, 4 parts vermouth, a dash of bitters, and an orange peel, in a shaker with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
A Mexican screwdriver!
Mix a shot of your favorite tequila with a half glass of Orange juice or other fruit juice.
The Tequila Sunrise is a cocktail made of tequila, orange juice, and grenadine syrup and served unmixed in a tall glass .
1 measure tequila, a half measure grenadine, and 3/4 of a cup of orange juice. Pour over ice and garnish with sliced orange
